entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:20PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW IMPACTS ON SIERRA PASSES POSSIBLE FRIDAY, THEN A SERIES OF STRONGER STORMS WILL IMPACT THE REGION THIS WEEKEND INTO EARLY NEXT WEEK... A very active pattern returns this weekend into early next week. An extended period of travel disruptions could extend into early next week as a series of storms move through the region.
